opponent.label: Spider-Woman
opponent.writer: nmasp, FrostFireFive, Just Saiyan, A Fat Llama
opponent.description: "Alright people, let's start at the beginning. My name's Gwen Stacy. I'm from Earth-65. And I am the one, the only, Spider-Woman. I'm a part-time crime-fighter. A part-time rocker. And a full-time badass, so I've been told. You probably know the rest..."
